text.raw:
OpenProject is an open source project collaboration software. It supports project teams throughout the whole project management life-cycle.  
You can get more information about the following topics:

**Feature Tour**  
Learn more about OpenProject features and published plugins.  
[go to features ›](https://www.openproject.com/collaboration-software-features/)

**OpenProject Professional Services**  
Would you like to use OpenProject in the cloud or book professional enterprise services.  
[find out more ›](https://www.openproject.org/)

**Download and installation**  
Here you can find information about how to download and install your own OpenProject instance, either manually or by packager.  
[find out more ›](https://www.openproject.org/download-and-installation/)

**Develop OpenProject**  
This is the place to find all the information around code, development and workflow of OpenProject.  
[find out more ›](https://docs.openproject.org/development)

**Blog**  
Our OpenProject News moved to a new Blog.  
[read the articles ›](https://www.openproject.org/blog/)

**Help**  
You will find support on our new [Help](https://www.openproject.org/help/) page (including user guides).  
[go to Forums ›](https://community.openproject.com/projects/openproject/boards)  
[go to Shortcuts ›](https://www.openproject.org/help/keyboard-shortcuts-access-keys/)  
[go to Glossary ›](https://www.openproject.org/help/glossary/)

**Cannot find an answer? - Contact us.**  
If you have questions or comments and cannot find your answer right away, write us an e-mail: info@openproject.org.
